title: Home & Family Conversation
description: Practice simple dialogues about home & family.

steps.pinyin: A: nǐ jiā dà bù dà?
B: bú dà, dàn shì hěn shū fú.
A: nǐ hé jiā rén zhù yì qǐ ma?
steps.english_hint: Do you live with your family?

steps.pinyin: B: duì, wǒ gēn fù mǔ yì qǐ zhù.
steps.english_hint: Yes, I live with my parents.

steps.pinyin: A: nǐ yǒu jǐ gè xiōng dì jiě mèi?
steps.english_hint: How many siblings do you have?

steps.teacher: B：我有一個哥哥和一個妹妹。
expected_answer: 我有一個哥哥和一個妹妹。
steps.pinyin: B: wǒ yǒu yí gè gē ge hé yí gè mèi mei.
steps.english_hint: I have an older brother and a younger sister.

steps.pinyin: A: nǐ xǐ huān nǐ de fáng jiān ma?
B: xǐ huān, yīn wèi hěn ān jìng.
A: nǐ cháng cháng zài jiā zuò shén me?
steps.english_hint: What do you usually do at home?

steps.pinyin: B: wǒ cháng cháng kàn shū hé tīng yīn yuè.
steps.english_hint: I usually read and listen to music.

review.summary: You practiced simple conversations about home & family.
